solution_line_template: In {num_days} days, Macy is able to run {miles_per_day} x {num_days} = <<{miles_per_day}*{num_days}={miles_run_in_6_days}>>{miles_run_in_6_days} miles.
Therefore, she has {weekly_goal} - {miles_run_in_6_days} = <<{weekly_goal}-{miles_run_in_6_days}={miles_left}>>{miles_left} miles left to run to meet her goal.
